author: Eleanor Doughty
title: The very best anti-ageing cleansers on the market
text: Your face wash is doubtless part of your cleansing routine , and whether it's something you focus on first thing in the morning to wake you up, or before you go to bed for a renewed feeling of feeling before slumber, it's important to find the right cleanser for you. But have you considered an anti-ageing cleanser? There are plenty about, all promising the earth - that, in those few seconds that the cleanser is on your face, and being massaged in, significant anti-ageing benefits can be had. If you're in the market for the perfect anti-ageing cleanser to complete your collection, then these are the very best. 1. Decleor Decleor's hydrating anti-ageing Aroma Cleanse is specially modified for mature skin. Its Sweet Almond Oil gently cleanses and removes makeup, while its Magnolia Essential Oil soothes dehydrated skin and protects collagen fibres. The Hyaluronic Acid plumps and smoothes and fine lines and wrinkles appear reduced for youthful-looking skin. £22.50, feelunique.com 2. Perricone MD As well as removing makeup - for that is what a cleanser ought to do - Perricone MD's Nutritive Cleanser delivering anti-ageing benefits in bucket loads. Helping to improve the skin's texture, it brightens skin, and its Alpha Lipoic Acid minimises surface imperfections. Just the ticket. £35, feelunique.com 3. Olay Olay's Anti-Wrinkle Firm & Lift Face Wash cleanses and refreshes the skin as it fights the signs of ageing. Its Skin Renewal Complex combines anti-ageing ingredients, with Niacinamide and Pro-Vitamin B5 to reduce lines and wrinkles. They say it works in just 14 days, and by your fourth week of use, skin will feel firmer and look more lifted. £4.19, boots.com 4. Elizabeth Arden Another glorious treat from Elizabeth Arden's specially formulated anti-ageing range PREVAGE®, this cleanser helps to correct environmental damage suffered on the skin, leaving you looking more youthful. With a faint citrus smell, you'll feel refreshed and hydrated to the max after use. £39, johnlewis.com 5. Philosophy Philosophy's Miracle Worker cleanser makes a bold claim, but, gently exfoliating the skin as it goes, it leaves you feeling completely clean with radiant youthful-looking skin. Use it daily for a deep cleanse, or once a week as an anti-ageing mask. Helping to brighten the skin tone and buffer away fine lines and wrinkles, it is cleansing magic in a bottle. £29.50, johnlewis.com Read more • The very best day creams • Our favourite night creams • Anti-ageing top tips: pick up some SPF • The best anti-ageing hand creams telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
